function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of clarity on exposure time calculation method","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure by face-to-face contact within a social distance radius","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure by being in the same room","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases through face-to-face contact within social distance radius","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for individual mobility patterns and heterogeneity","category":"Transport","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited consideration of population heterogeneity in transportation environments","category":"Transport","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of attribution in reusing published material","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on construction professionals’ perceptions","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability of perceptions among different groups and over time","category":"Working","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limitations in study design and generalization of outcomes","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perceived impact of covid-19 decreasing over time","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Descending trend in the level of concern for covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Change in working time due to covid-19","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to distancing and hygiene protocols during post-evaluation discussions","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Construction professionals expressing concerns about handling family issues during covid-19","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in ratings of concerns about changes in project time/cost/scope between group a and group b","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Low weighted average scores in group ratings","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Perceived status changes between rounds","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Preparedness ratings for handling the impact of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"No statistically significant difference in impact score between rounds in group a","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased working time for group b participants in the initial survey round","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collecting survey responses during the covid-19 pandemic may introduce bias due to the impact of the pandemic on respondents’ perspectives and behaviors.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using a cross-sectional approach may overlook the dynamic nature of the covid-19 situation, leading to limited insights into longitudinal changes.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ambiguity and inconsistencies in covid-19 statistics due to economic expediencies and ambiguous behavior of the virus","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unreliable space for foreign direct investment fdi in construction projects","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Multiple rounds of surveys conducted with construction professionals","category":"Working","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient consideration of the impact of digital methodologies on public health","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sampling strategy targeting a particular group may limit the representation of diverse experiences and perspectives.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global circulation of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases in crowded cities due to interactions in social and professional settings.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Anti-density discourse may reinforce overcrowding in homes due to insane rents.","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of public transportation and crowded areas in cities","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of attention to complexities, ironies, and potentialities of modernity","category":"Culture/Diversity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rigid polarities and flat totalisations in twentieth-century thinking","category":"Culture/Diversity","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Loss of geographical sensibility in spatial storytelling","category":"Culture/Diversity","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of dialogue between individual contributors","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglect of communication and dialogue in organizing cities and lives","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate use of podcasting and radio as research dissemination methods","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close proximity and interaction with various individuals during the podcast project.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Personal and immediate contributions may lead to a lack of academic rigor in addressing contagious disease propagation","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Anxiety and self-reflection can affect the ability to objectively analyze and address contagious disease propagation","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focusing on faraway lands may result in neglecting local contagious disease propagation issues","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate control over the quality of audio submissions","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness or consideration for contagious disease transmission during audio recording","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient consideration for privacy and consent during recording","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interpreting vague instructions leading to different interpretations of the task","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of the task leading to off-topic submissions","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of covid-19 being used as a context for contributions without explicit request","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Discussion of covid-19 pandemic and academic experts’ role","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Call for audio stories about covid-19 experiences","category":"Health","confidence":"High"}]}
